original_title: ハロウィン・パジャマ
overview: A ten-year old girl Jakou Ran encounters strange people in her dreams. She comes to find out that those people are wandering ghosts, still with attachments to this world who can't go to heaven. In her alter ego, Halloween Pajama, she helps see the ghosts on their way to heaven. Short Movie by Yasuhiro Irie based on his self published manga by the same name.
title: Halloween Pajama
